author: ehatcher
msg: Make XmlLogger finally a real BuildLogger. When used as a logger it will utilize Ant's logging level (-verbose, -quiet, etc), but remember to use -logfile, otherwise the output will be written to the console. Its previous BuildListener functionality, of course, still works as it did, writing to log.xml (or the XmlLogger.file property value)

author: umagesh
msg: * Add it and well as FilterReader to defaults.properties
* Arrange entries in defaults.properties in alphabetical order (hope nobody minds)
